itunes:title: [BONUS] The Simply Genius Cookbook is Here!
itunes:author: The Food52 Podcast Network
itunes:summary: The Simply Genius Cookbook by Kristen Miglore, host of Food52's Genius Recipe Tapes podcast is FINALLY here! To celebrate we wanted to share an episode of the GRT podcast featuring a recipe from the book, Tara O'Brady's Basic, Great Chocolate Chip Cookies
itunes:subtitle: The Simply Genius Cookbook by Kristen Miglore, host of Food52's Genius Recipe Tapes podcast is FINALLY here! To celebrate we wanted to share an episode of the GRT podcast featuring a recipe from the book, Tara O'Brady's Basic, Great Chocolate Chip Cookies
